query: Am I eligible for an H4 visa if my spouse has an H1B?
response: Yes, you are eligible for an H-4 visa as long as your spouse holds a valid H-1B status and you can provide proper marital documentation.

query: Am I eligible for an H4 visa if my spouse has an H1B?
response: Yes, you are eligible for an H-4 visa as long as your spouse holds a valid H-1B status and you can provide proper marital documentation.

query: Am I eligible for an H4 visa if my spouse has an H1B?
response:
ELIGIBILITY: Yes

REASONS:
• H4 is the dependent visa category for the spouse of a valid H1B holder.
• Eligibility is directly tied to the H1B spouse’s lawful status under U.S. immigration rules.
• No additional financial or employment criteria are required for H4 approval.

FINAL DECISION:
You are eligible for an H4 dependent visa as long as your spouse maintains valid H1B status.

query: Can I work in the U.S. on an H4 visa?
response:
ELIGIBILITY: Partially

REASONS:
• H4 status alone does not grant employment authorization.
• Work is permitted only after receiving an H4 EAD.
• EAD eligibility depends on the H1B spouse having an approved I-140.

FINAL DECISION:
You may work in the U.S. only after receiving an H4 EAD. Without an EAD card, employment is not permitted.

query: My H1B spouse recently changed employers. Do I need to file a new H4 visa?
response:
ELIGIBILITY: Yes

REASONS:
• H4 status is tied to the H1B holder’s current employer and petition.
• A change in the H1B employer requires the dependent’s status to be updated.
• Filing an H4 extension ensures continuous lawful stay.

FINAL DECISION:
You must file an H4 extension or obtain updated visa stamping reflecting the new H1B approval.

query: Is my child eligible for an H4 visa if they are 20 years old?
response:
ELIGIBILITY: Yes

REASONS:
• H4 eligibility covers unmarried children under 21.
• A 20-year-old dependent falls within the USCIS age limit.
• Eligibility ends upon reaching age 21.

FINAL DECISION:
Your child qualifies for H4 status until they turn 21. After that, they must shift to another visa category such as F1.

query: Can I study in the U.S. while on an H4 visa?
response:
ELIGIBILITY: Yes

REASONS:
• H4 status permits full-time or part-time study.
• No need to convert to F1 for education alone.
• Immigration rules impose no study restrictions on H4 holders.

FINAL DECISION:
You are fully eligible to study in the U.S. under H4 status without switching to F1.

query: Can I travel outside the U.S. while my H4 extension is pending?
response:
ELIGIBILITY: Partially

REASONS:
• Travel is permitted but it automatically cancels the pending H4 extension.
• Re-entry requires a valid H4 visa stamp.
• USCIS treats travel as abandonment of the pending extension.

FINAL DECISION:
You may travel abroad, but your pending H4 extension will be cancelled. You must re-enter with a valid H4 visa.

query: Is biometric required for H4 visa stamping?
response:
ELIGIBILITY: Yes

REASONS:
• Biometric submission is part of standard consular processing.
• H4 applicants undergo fingerprinting for security clearance.
• Mandatory for both first-time applicants and renewals.

FINAL DECISION:
Biometrics are required for H4 visa stamping under current consular procedures.

query: Can I change from H4 to F1 while living in the U.S.?
response:
ELIGIBILITY: Yes

REASONS:
• USCIS allows in-country change of status from H4 to F1.
• You may stay legally in the U.S. while the application is pending.
• F1 approval requires proof of financial support and full-time study.

FINAL DECISION:
You may apply for a change of status from H4 to F1 and remain in the U.S. until USCIS issues a decision.

query: Can an H4 EAD holder work multiple jobs?
response:
ELIGIBILITY: Yes

REASONS:
• H4 EAD provides unrestricted employment authorization.
• USCIS imposes no employer or job-type limitations.
• EAD remains valid until expiration regardless of job changes.

FINAL DECISION:
With a valid H4 EAD, you may work multiple jobs or switch jobs freely.

query: Is an interview mandatory for H4 visa stamping in India?
response:
ELIGIBILITY: Partially

REASONS:
• First-time H4 applicants generally require an interview.
• Renewals may qualify for interview waiver under the Dropbox program.
• Eligibility depends on the applicant’s prior visa history.

FINAL DECISION:
An interview is typically required for first-time H4 stamping. Renewals may be eligible for interview waiver depending on consulate rules.

query: Do I need to submit my spouse’s pay stubs for H4 visa stamping?
response:
ELIGIBILITY: Yes

REASONS:
• H1B pay stubs prove the spouse’s lawful employment.
• Consulates require them as part of H4 documentation.
• They demonstrate ongoing compliance with H1B regulations.

FINAL DECISION:
You must submit recent H1B pay stubs when applying for H4 visa stamping to verify lawful employment of the primary visa holder.

query: Can an H4 EAD holder start a business in the U.S.?
response:
ELIGIBILITY: Yes

REASONS:
• H4 EAD grants unrestricted employment rights.
• Running a business is considered authorized employment.
• No special business-specific authorization is required.

FINAL DECISION:
With a valid H4 EAD, you may legally start, own, and manage a business in the U.S.

query: Can I stay in the U.S. if my spouse loses their H1B job?
response:
ELIGIBILITY: No

REASONS:
• H4 status fully depends on the H1B spouse maintaining lawful employment.
• If H1B status ends, dependent status automatically becomes invalid.
• USCIS requires departure or filing a new status promptly.

FINAL DECISION:
If your spouse loses H1B status, you cannot remain on H4. You must change status or depart the U.S.

query: Is my newborn child eligible for H4 status?
response:
ELIGIBILITY: Yes

REASONS:
• Newborns of H1B holders qualify as dependents.
• A separate H4 visa must be issued before entry into the U.S.
• Eligibility is automatic upon proving parental status.

FINAL DECISION:
Your newborn child qualifies for H4 status and will require visa stamping before entering the U.S.

query: Can I apply for H4 EAD immediately after my spouse’s I-140 approval?
response:
ELIGIBILITY: Yes

REASONS:
• I-140 approval makes the H4 spouse eligible for employment authorization.
• USCIS permits immediate filing after approval.
• No waiting period or additional conditions apply.

FINAL DECISION:
You may apply for H4 EAD as soon as the H1B spouse’s I-140 is approved.

query: Do H4 visa holders need to file U.S. taxes?
response:
ELIGIBILITY: Partially

REASONS:
• H4 holders without EAD are not required to file taxes.
• If earning through EAD, tax filing becomes mandatory.
• Household filing status may require listing dependents.

FINAL DECISION:
You must file taxes only if you earn income through H4 EAD. Otherwise, you appear as a dependent on the primary filer.

query: Can I study on H4 and later apply for CPT/OPT?
response:
ELIGIBILITY: Partially

REASONS:
• H4 allows study, but CPT/OPT require F1 status.
• USCIS mandates F1 conversion before granting work benefits.
• CPT/OPT rules do not apply to H4.

FINAL DECISION:
You may study on H4, but you must switch to F1 to qualify for CPT or OPT.

query: Can I stay in the U.S. while my H4 EAD renewal is pending?
response:
ELIGIBILITY: Yes

REASONS:
• H4 holders may remain legally while extension or EAD renewal is pending.
• Work authorization pauses until the EAD card arrives.
• Status remains lawful during the review period.

FINAL DECISION:
You may stay in the U.S. while your H4 EAD renewal is pending, but cannot work until the new card is approved.

query: Does my H1B spouse need to accompany me for H4 stamping?
response:
ELIGIBILITY: No

REASONS:
• H4 interviews do not require the presence of the H1B spouse.
• Documentation is sufficient for verification.
• Consular officers do not interview primary visa holders during dependent processing.

FINAL DECISION:
You may attend H4 visa stamping alone. The H1B spouse’s presence is not required.

query: Can I apply for an H4 visa while living in a third country?
response:
ELIGIBILITY: Yes

REASONS:
• U.S. consulates accept applications from legal residents of third countries.
• Visa processing depends on lawful residence, not nationality.
• Many applicants complete stamping outside their home country.

FINAL DECISION:
You may apply for H4 visa stamping in any country where you are legally residing.

query: Can I renew my H4 visa without my spouse renewing H1B?
response:
ELIGIBILITY: No

REASONS:
• H4 status cannot extend beyond the primary H1B’s validity.
• USCIS requires a valid H1B approval notice for H4 processing.
• Renewing H4 without an active H1B violates dependency rules.

FINAL DECISION:
You cannot renew your H4 unless your spouse’s H1B is valid and approved.

query: Do I need a separate H4 visa appointment for each of my children?
response:
ELIGIBILITY: Yes

REASONS:
• Each dependent must appear individually in the visa system.
• Consulates issue unique DS-160 and appointment records per child.
• Family appointments may be grouped but are still processed individually.

FINAL DECISION:
Each child requires a separate H4 visa appointment, although the family may attend together.
